content:
TITLE: Installing Dependencies for Reflex Sales Template
DESCRIPTION: Command to install all required dependencies from requirements.txt file
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/sales/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the Reflex Application
DESCRIPTION: Command to start the Reflex application locally
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/sales/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
reflex run
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running the Application
DESCRIPTION: Command to start and run the customer data application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/customer_data_app/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
reflex run
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing Reflex Database
DESCRIPTION: Command to initialize the database for the Reflex application
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/sales/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
reflex db init
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing Database Schema
DESCRIPTION: Command to initialize the database schema based on rx.Model definitions. This creates the initial database structure.
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/customer_data_app/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
reflex db init
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Applying Database Migrations
DESCRIPTION: Command to apply pending database migrations to update the schema.
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/customer_data_app/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
reflex db migrate
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Applying Database Migration in Reflex
DESCRIPTION: Command to apply pending database migrations
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/sales/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
reflex db migrate
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Database Migration
DESCRIPTION: Command to create database migration scripts when schema changes are made.
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/customer_data_app/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
reflex db makemigrations --message "Brief description of the change"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating Database Migration in Reflex
DESCRIPTION: Command to create a new database migration for schema changes
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/sales/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
reflex db makemigrations --message "Brief description of the change"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting External Database URL
DESCRIPTION: Command to configure an external PostgreSQL database connection using environment variables. Requires the psycopg database driver.
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/customer_data_app/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
export DB_URL="postgresql+psycopg://appuser:mysecretpassword@localhost:5432/mydatabase"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Python Package Dependencies
DESCRIPTION: Specifies required Python packages and version constraints. Includes Reflex framework v0.5.5 or higher, Replicate v0.26.0, a Reflex image comparison slider component, and the requests library.
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/ai_image_gen/requirements.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
reflex>=0.5.5
replicate==0.26.0
reflex-img-comparison-slider>=0.0.1
requests
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Specifying Python Package Dependencies for Reflex Project
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the required Python packages for a Reflex project. It specifies a minimum version for Reflex and includes a PostgreSQL database adapter.
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/customer_data_app/requirements.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
reflex>=0.5.3
psycopg2-binary
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Python Package Dependencies
DESCRIPTION: Specifies required Python packages and their minimum versions. Requires reflex version 0.4.6 or higher and openai version 1 or higher.
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/sales/requirements.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
reflex>=0.4.6
openai>=1
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Reflex Dependencies with Chakra UI
DESCRIPTION: Specifies the required Python package dependencies for a Reflex project. Includes the core Reflex framework at version 0.6.0a or higher and the Reflex Chakra UI component library.
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/api_admin_panel/requirements.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
reflex>=0.6.0a
reflex-chakra
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Defining Dependencies for Reflex Project
DESCRIPTION: This requirements.txt file specifies two essential dependencies: Reflex framework version 0.4.0 or higher, and the OpenAI package version 1 or higher. These dependencies are necessary for building Reflex applications that utilize OpenAI services.
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/dalle/requirements.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
reflex>=0.4.0
openai>=1
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Specifying Python Package Dependencies for Reflex Project
DESCRIPTION: This snippet defines the required Python packages for a Reflex project. It specifies Reflex version 0.5.3 or higher and includes the pandas library without a specific version constraint.
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/nba/requirements.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
reflex>=0.5.3
pandas
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Specifying Reflex Framework Dependency in requirements.txt
DESCRIPTION: Defines a dependency on Reflex framework, requiring version 0.5.5 or higher. This is a standard Python package dependency specification used in requirements.txt files for pip installation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/dashboard/requirements.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
reflex>=0.5.5
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Specifying Reflex Version Requirement
DESCRIPTION: This line sets the minimum required version of Reflex to 0.5.4 or higher. It ensures that the project uses a compatible version of the Reflex framework.
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/ci_template/requirements.txt#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
reflex>=0.5.4
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting OpenAI API Key on Linux/macOS
DESCRIPTION: Command to set the OpenAI API key environment variable on Unix-based systems
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/sales/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
export OPENAI_API_KEY=your-openai-api-key
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting OpenAI API Key on Windows Command Prompt
DESCRIPTION: Command to set the OpenAI API key environment variable in Windows Command Prompt
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/sales/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
set OPENAI_API_KEY=your-openai-api-key
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting OpenAI API Key on Windows PowerShell
DESCRIPTION: Command to set the OpenAI API key environment variable in Windows PowerShell
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/sales/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
$env:OPENAI_API_KEY="your-openai-api-key"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Cloning Customer Data App Repository
DESCRIPTION: Command to clone the customer data application repository from GitHub to your local machine.
SOURCE: https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/blob/main/customer_data_app/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/reflex-dev/templates/tree/main/customer_data_app
```
